teaching.name: Computer Science Fundamentals
teaching.tagline: Project-based learning course in computer science fundamentals for beginners.

teaching.name: Algorithmic Design Principles
teaching.tagline: Reinterpretation of intermediate computer science principles, focusing on architecting algorithms from scratch.

teaching.name: Data Visualization and Communication
teaching.tagline: Introductory course on contemporary data visualization and presentation techniques with a multidisciplinary perspective.

teaching.name: Machine Learning Foundations
teaching.tagline: Project-based and domain-agnostic introduction to historical and contemporary machine learning techniques.

teaching.name: Deep Learning and Modeling Design
teaching.tagline: Higher-level course on project-based modeling, with a particular focus on neural network design and implementation.

teaching.name: Machine Learning in Production
teaching.tagline: Adaptive course covering wide range of topics in deploying and scaling machine learning architectures.
